Ron Shand https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ron_Shand 0 Ronald Ernest McMurtry (3 February 1906 in Carlton, Melbourne, Australia – 8 August 1993), professionally known as Ron Shand was Australian actor and comedian who worked extensively in numerously genres of the show business industry including, circus, soft shoe, theatre, cabaret, revue vaudeville, radio, television and film. Shand was also a recording artist. He was probably best known however for his role in television soap opera Number 96 as Herbert "Herb" Evans. Ronald_Ernest_McMurtry ( 3_February_1906 in Carlton , Melbourne , Australia – 8_August_1993 ) , professionally_known as Ron_Shand was Australian_actor and comedian who worked extensively in numerously_genres of the_show_business_industry_including , circus , soft_shoe , theatre , cabaret , revue_vaudeville , radio_,_television_and_film . Shand was also a_recording_artist . He was_probably_best_known however for his_role in television_soap_opera_Number 96 as Herbert_"_Herb_"_Evans .
